page.title: 01RESUME, CHEADLE.
page.content: {THE WHOLE OF THE D BLOCK}IS IN THE REGION OF{GREATER MANCHESTER} COUNTY.THE BLOCK IS DIVIDED INTO TWO DISTINCT PARTS. THREEQUARTERS OF THE BLOCK CONSISTS OF MAINLY RESIDENTIAL HOUSING WITH SHOPPING AREAS DISPERSED INTERMITTENTLY. ONE QUARTER OF THE AREA, HOWEVER, IS TAKEN UP BY THE M56 MOTORWAY WHICH EXTENDS THE FULL WIDTH OF THE D BLOCK AND LEADS TO STOCKPORT WHICH IS THE MAJOR TOWN OF THE AREA. THE AREA HAS ADEQUATE SERVICES AVAILABLE TO ITS RESIDENTS WHICH INCLUDE A CINEMA, TRAIN SERVICES, BUS SERVICES AND MULTI-CULTURAL RELIGIOUS ESTABLISHMENTS. THERE ARE TWO LARGE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS IN THE D BLOCK WHICH SERVE THE MAJOR PART OF THE COMMUNITY.THERE ARE NO INDUSTRIAL COMPLEXES IN THIS AREA AS IT IS A SUBURB OF STOCKPORT.
